MESSAGES.something_went_wrong: Something went wrong, try again or contact support@aglancesolutions.com.
MESSAGES.reset_password_success: An email has been sent to {{email}} with a link to reset your password.
MESSAGES.verify_email_info: An email has been sent to {{email}} with a link to confirm your email.
MESSAGES.password_length: Password must be at least 8 characters.
MESSAGES.password_uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
MESSAGES.password_lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
MESSAGES.password_digit: Password must contain at least one digit.
MESSAGES.invalid_token: Invalid token, try to reset the password again.
MESSAGES.user_lockedout: This user has been deactivated. Contact your Clinic Administrator to be reactivated.
MESSAGES.confirm_email: An email has been sent to {{email}}, click the link in the mail to change your email address.
MESSAGES.email_changed: Your email has successfully been changed to:
MESSAGES.drawing_are_emtpy_nothing_saved: Drawings are empty, nothing is saved.
MESSAGES.overlapping_schedules: Overlapping drawing schedules are not allowed.
MESSAGES.accept_cookies: By continuing to browse the site, you agree to our use of cookies. Learn more in our
MESSAGES.token_expired: The token is expired, a new "Reset password" is sent to your email address.

FORM.invalid_password: Password must contain: a lowercase letter, an uppercase letter and a digit
FORM.password_length: Password must be at least 8 characters.

confirm.cancel_subscription: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription?

delete_promt.title: Delete
delete_promt.message: Are you sure you want to delete this

more_body_charts.title: Only first perspective is used.
more_body_charts.message: You can draw on multiple body charts:

start_tour.title: Want to take a tour?
start_tour.message: Start a short tutorial in the app.

nothing_saved.message: You finished the tutorial. Nothing was saved from the tutorial.

start.title: App tour
start.content: Click the question icon to start the app tour again. Click the green arrow to begin

toggleZoom.title: Draw
toggleZoom.content: Switch between dragging the body chart and drawing on the body chart (Ctrl + D)

resetZoom.title: Reset size
resetZoom.content: Fits the whole body chart to the screen (Ctrl + F)

zoomOut.title: Zoom out
zoomOut.content: See more of the body chart on screen (-)

penSize.title: Pensize
penSize.content: Change the thickness of the drawing line

painType.title: Pain type
painType.content: Change between pain and types of discomfort

templates.title: Body view
templates.content: Choose front, back, left and right side body views

save.title: Submit all
save.content: Save all the drawings you have made (Ctrl + S)

nextTemplate.title: Next view
nextTemplate.content: The top buttons allow you to switch between body views (→)

fillAreas.title: Drawing instructions
fillAreas.content: Fill the entire area that represents the location of your pain or discomfort

tourError.title: No circles or outlines
tourError.content: Outlines of areas may miss important information. Fill in all areas

patient-list.title: Patient list
patient-list.content: In the Patients section you can search and find all registered patients

change-language.title: Change language
change-language.content: Click here to change the language

start-timeline.title: Timeline
start-timeline.content: Click the timeline button to view current and past pain drawings

new-drawing.title: New drawing
new-drawing.content: Create a new drawing with or for the patient

new-schedule.title: Create a new schedule
new-schedule.content: Create a drawing schedule for a predefined time period and number of drawings per day

export-patient.title: Export patient
export-patient.content: Selected export of a patient's pain drawings and pixel count as a PDF

menu.title: Menu
menu.content: Click the menu button to Log out or to see additional options such as feedback and Terms of Service

LOGIN.reset_password_by_click: Reset password by submitting your email here:
LOGIN.agree_with_terms: By signing in you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
LOGIN.register_agree_with_terms: By registering a clinic you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

SIGNUP.success: The clinic is successfully created, check your inbox to confirm your email.

PATIENT.confirm_patient_remove: Are you sure you want to remove this patient from your clinic?
PATIENT.patient_remove_consequences: This means your clinic no longer will have access to this patient and the patient cannot submit charts that will be accessible by your clinic.

FEEDBACK.feedback_text: If you have any valuable feedback, insights, critics, proposals or ideas, feel free to submit them here:
FEEDBACK.satisfaction: What do you think about the app?

INVITE.invite_to_try: Invite your colleagues to try Navigate Pain.

PAYMENT.confirm_client_funded_model: Are you sure you want to select the client-funded model?
PAYMENT.pricing: Start a subscription to access the service.
PAYMENT.no_of_charts_bundles: Save up to 4 chart bundles per day.
PAYMENT.stripe_stores_info: We do not store any credit card information, we utilize the trusted Stripe Secure Payment Portal to safely handle your credit information.
PAYMENT.select_fundning_model: Select pricing model for your clinic
PAYMENT.paid_service: Integrated as a paid service for your clients
PAYMENT.free_service: Integrated as a free service for your clients
PAYMENT.trial_period_beta: Trial period until 31. December + 7 additional trial days
PAYMENT.currency_nb: NB. Note that the payment is made in Euro (€) and the prices shown in other currencies are based on today's rate.

EMAIL.anyQuestions: If you have any questions you can contact us at

INVITE.subject: Invitation for Navigate Pain
INVITE.firstLine: {0} invites you to check out Navigate Pain – a software application to map pain and discomfort.
INVITE.secondLine: App features: Male, female and child body charts; Pain intensity tracking; quantified pain area.
INVITE.thirdLine: Clinic incitements: Track pain location, area and intensity over time as recorded in the clinic or the patient’s home. Start each consultation right on topic.

SCHEDULE.subject: Remember to draw your pain
SCHEDULE.firstLine: Hi {0}, on behalf of {1} here is a little reminder for you to draw pain today.
SCHEDULE.thirdLine: Get access to Navigate Pain by clicking the link below:

RESET.subject: Reset Password
RESET.firstLine: Hi, you've recently asked to reset the password for this Navigate Pain account: {0}
RESET.secondLine: If you did not request this change, please let us know immediately by replying to this email.
RESET.thirdLine: Reset your password by clicking the link below.

CONFIRM.subject: Confirm Email Address
CONFIRM.secondLine: Please confirm your email address by clicking the link below.
CONFIRM.thirdLine: It is important that we have the right email address.

CHANGE.subject: Confirm your new email address
CHANGE.firstLine: We received a request to change your email address to {0}.
CHANGE.secondLine: If you did not request this change, please let us know immediately by replying to this email.
CHANGE.thirdLine: Your email will be updated when you click the link button below:

SET_PASSWORD.subject: Set Password
SET_PASSWORD.thirdLine: Please set your password by clicking the link below:
